item.description:
This is the first Boston Area Screening of American Harmony (aka as the Greatest Vocal Competition You've Never Known). It's being held at the Regent Theater in Arlington and we are inviting all kinds of A Cappella Groups to the movie and to the Open Mic session to follow.

It's a chance to see some of the greatest quartets ever up on screen, and we are also hoping to have guest performances by several well known local groups.

Doors open at 7 pm. For more info go to

http://www.regentthea...

Hope to see you there!

group.name: Boston Area Acapella Barbershop Quartet/Chorus Singing

item.name: American Harmony....the Movie, (and open mic)
